channel.title: DC Court Graffik SE Shoes
channel.description:
I'm not sure of how big the majority of people on these forums are skaters. But I just hate it when I get a crappy pair of skate shoes.
I have recently bought a pair of DC Court Graffik SE Shoes and in the picture they look like the average skate shoe. But when I got them they felt like high tops. Just be careful when buying DC SHOE CO shoes as they are a lot bigger then they look.
You can review them here: http://www.skatewarehouse.com/descpageMSDCSHOES-DCGSWBC.html
[img]http://img.skatewarehouse.com/ProductImages/DCGSWBC.jpg[/img]

item.title: DC Court Graffik SE Shoes
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Cald Panda, post:15, topic:232898”][quote author=Holic link=topic=307156.msg2479600#msg2479600 date=1223441428]

They really are quite ugly. But I have owned a few pairs.

Look at your picture, and tell me again hightops are ugly.

You do know what currency is, right?

Yeah, seeing as he talked about it, I’m sure he does. I believe you’re looking for “exchange rate”
[/quote]Even with the exchange rates. It’s $30 cheaper to buy from the US.[/quote]

Yeah it pisses me off how much cheaper the shoes are there. Here (Canada) it’s almost impossible to get a good pair for cheaper then 100-150 dollars. In the states I couldn’t even find a pair that costs more then 60… I was like wtf I don’t want crap shoes and I couldn’t find any exspensive ones.

[quote=“runescape3dude, post:16, topic:232898”][quote author=Cald Panda link=topic=307156.msg2479684#msg2479684 date=1223455078]

They really are quite ugly. But I have owned a few pairs.

Look at your picture, and tell me again hightops are ugly.

You do know what currency is, right?

Yeah, seeing as he talked about it, I’m sure he does. I believe you’re looking for “exchange rate”
[/quote]Even with the exchange rates. It’s $30 cheaper to buy from the US.

cause they are made in the US.[/quote]

If by the US you mean small children in sweatshops, then yes.

Read full topic

One word. Fugly.

Take at look at Emerica HSU, my favourite shoes to date.
